messages.content: You are a helpful assistant for generating bug tickets.

Verification Builds:

Full Bug Description: App crashes when tapping the profile picture

Environment: iPhone 12 Pro Max, iOS 14.4.2
App Version: 1.0.5
Tested on: 25th May, 2021
You are a helpful assistant for generating bug tickets.

Summary:

Full Bug Description: App crashes when tapping the profile picture
App crashes upon tapping profile picture
You are a helpful assistant for generating bug tickets.

Repro Steps:

Full Bug Description: App crashes when tapping the profile picture

1. Open the app on your device.
2. Navigate to the user profile section.
3. Tap on the profile picture.
4. Observe that the app crashes.
You are a helpful assistant for generating bug tickets.

Observed Results:

Full Bug Description: App crashes when tapping the profile picture

Actual Result:
The application unexpectedly shuts down upon tapping the profile picture.
You are a helpful assistant for generating bug tickets.

Expected Results:

Full Bug Description: App crashes when tapping the profile picture
The app should smoothly navigate to the profile page when the profile picture is tapped, without any crashes.
You are a helpful assistant for generating bug tickets.

Verification Builds:

Full Bug Description: Button 'Submit' does not respond on iOS

Environment & Versions: 
Tested on iPhone 12, iOS 14.4.2, App version 3.1.5
You are a helpful assistant for generating bug tickets.

Summary:

Full Bug Description: Button 'Submit' does not respond on iOS
'Submit' button unresponsive on iOS
You are a helpful assistant for generating bug tickets.

Repro Steps:

Full Bug Description: Button 'Submit' does not respond on iOS

1. Open the application on an iOS device.
2. Navigate to the page or screen where the 'Submit' button is located.
3. Fill out any necessary information or forms required before the 'Submit' button can be used.
4. Tap on the 'Submit' button.
5. Observe that there is no response or action taken by the application.
You are a helpful assistant for generating bug tickets.

Observed Results:

Full Bug Description: Button 'Submit' does not respond on iOS
When the 'Submit' button is pressed on iOS, there is no response or action taken by the application.
You are a helpful assistant for generating bug tickets.

Expected Results:

Full Bug Description: Button 'Submit' does not respond on iOS
The 'Submit' button should trigger the associated action when pressed on iOS devices.
You are a helpful assistant for generating bug tickets.

Verification Builds:

Full Bug Description: App loads forever on login with poor internet
Environment: Android 10, Samsung Galaxy S10. App Version: 1.2.3. Internet Speed: 2Mbps.
You are a helpful assistant for generating bug tickets.

Summary:

Full Bug Description: App loads forever on login with poor internet
App indefinitely loads during login with weak internet connection.
You are a helpful assistant for generating bug tickets.

Repro Steps:

Full Bug Description: App loads forever on login with poor internet

Steps to Reproduce the Bug:

1. Ensure your device is connected to a poor internet connection. You can simulate this by using tools like Network Link Conditioner on iOS or by limiting your bandwidth on your router settings.
2. Open the application on your device.
3. Navigate to the login page.
4. Enter your valid login credentials.
5. Press the 'Login' button and observe the application's response.
You are a helpful assistant for generating bug tickets.

Observed Results:

Full Bug Description: App loads forever on login with poor internet
When the bug occurs, the application continues to load indefinitely during login when internet connection is weak or unstable.
You are a helpful assistant for generating bug tickets.

Expected Results:

Full Bug Description: App loads forever on login with poor internet
The app should display a timeout error or a low connectivity warning when trying to login with poor internet.
You are a helpful assistant for generating bug tickets.

Verification Builds:

Full Bug Description: Notification sound doesn't play on Android 14
Environment & Versions: Android 14, tested on Samsung Galaxy S21, App version 3.2.1
You are a helpful assistant for generating bug tickets.

Summary:

Full Bug Description: Notification sound doesn't play on Android 14
Notification sound not working on Android 14
You are a helpful assistant for generating bug tickets.

Repro Steps:

Full Bug Description: Notification sound doesn't play on Android 14

Steps to reproduce the bug:

1. Ensure that your Android device is running on Android 14.
2. Go to 'Settings' on your Android device.
3. Scroll down and click on 'Apps & notifications'.
4. Click on 'See all apps'.
5. Scroll down and select the app where the notification sound is not playing.
6. Click on 'App notifications'.
7. Ensure that the 'Show notifications' toggle is on.
8. Go back to the home screen and ask someone to send you a notification from the app.
9. Notice if the notification sound plays or not.
10. If the sound doesn't play, the bug is reproduced.
You are a helpful assistant for generating bug tickets.

Observed Results:

Full Bug Description: Notification sound doesn't play on Android 14
When the bug occurs, the notification sound fails to play on devices running Android 14.
You are a helpful assistant for generating bug tickets.

Expected Results:

Full Bug Description: Notification sound doesn't play on Android 14
The notification sound should correctly play when receiving notifications on Android 14 devices.
You are a helpful assistant for generating bug tickets.

Verification Builds:

Full Bug Description: Text input freezes after typing special characters
Environment: Windows 10 Pro, Chrome v89.0.4389.82, Application version 1.2.3, Keyboard layout: US English.
You are a helpful assistant for generating bug tickets.

Summary:

Full Bug Description: Text input freezes after typing special characters
Text input freezing post special characters input
You are a helpful assistant for generating bug tickets.

Repro Steps:

Full Bug Description: Text input freezes after typing special characters

Steps to Reproduce the Bug:

1. Open the application.
2. Navigate to the text input field.
3. Click on the text input field to activate it.
4. Start typing any random text.
5. Include a special character in the text (e.g., #, $, %, &, *, etc.).
6. Continue typing after inserting the special character.
7. Observe that the text input freezes and doesn't allow further typing.
You are a helpful assistant for generating bug tickets.

Observed Results:

Full Bug Description: Text input freezes after typing special characters

Actual Result:
The system becomes unresponsive and text input freezes upon entering special characters.
You are a helpful assistant for generating bug tickets.

Expected Results:

Full Bug Description: Text input freezes after typing special characters
Text input should continue functioning normally, even after typing special characters.
You are a helpful assistant for generating bug tickets.

Verification Builds:

Full Bug Description: Dark mode theme resets after restart
Environment: Windows 10 Pro, Version 1909. Software: App Version 3.2.1. Testing: Manual, Dark Mode enabled.
You are a helpful assistant for generating bug tickets.

Summary:

Full Bug Description: Dark mode theme resets after restart
Dark mode theme not persisting after restart.
You are a helpful assistant for generating bug tickets.

Repro Steps:

Full Bug Description: Dark mode theme resets after restart

1. Open the application.
2. Go to 'Settings'.
3. In the 'Display' or 'Appearance' section, select 'Dark Mode'.
4. Confirm the changes and exit the settings.
5. Close the application completely.
6. Restart the application.
7. Check if the theme remains in 'Dark Mode' or if it has reset to the default theme.
You are a helpful assistant for generating bug tickets.

Observed Results:

Full Bug Description: Dark mode theme resets after restart
When the bug occurs, the system's dark mode theme automatically switches back to the default light mode after a system restart.
You are a helpful assistant for generating bug tickets.

Expected Results:

Full Bug Description: Dark mode theme resets after restart
The dark mode theme should remain consistent and not reset after restarting the system.
You are a helpful assistant for generating bug tickets.

Verification Builds:

Full Bug Description: Search results show outdated items
Environment: Windows 10 Pro, Chrome v89.0. Testing on Production Server. Software Version: 1.0.2. Database Version: 5.7.
You are a helpful assistant for generating bug tickets.

Summary:

Full Bug Description: Search results show outdated items
Search results displaying outdated items.
You are a helpful assistant for generating bug tickets.

Repro Steps:

Full Bug Description: Search results show outdated items

1. Open the application or website where the issue is occurring.
2. Navigate to the search bar typically located at the top of the page.
3. Enter a search term for an item you know has been updated recently.
4. Click on the search icon or press enter to execute the search.
5. Review the search results.
6. Identify if the information displayed for the searched item is outdated.
7. Repeat steps 3-6 with different search terms to verify if the issue is consistent across multiple items.
You are a helpful assistant for generating bug tickets.

Observed Results:

Full Bug Description: Search results show outdated items

Actual Result:
The system displays outdated items in the search results instead of the most recent ones.
You are a helpful assistant for generating bug tickets.

Expected Results:

Full Bug Description: Search results show outdated items
Search results should only display current, up-to-date items.
You are a helpful assistant for generating bug tickets.

Verification Builds:

Full Bug Description: Camera permission prompt doesn't appear
Environment: Android 10, Samsung Galaxy S10. App version: 3.2.1. Test environment: Production.
You are a helpful assistant for generating bug tickets.

Summary:

Full Bug Description: Camera permission prompt doesn't appear
Camera permission prompt not appearing
You are a helpful assistant for generating bug tickets.

Repro Steps:

Full Bug Description: Camera permission prompt doesn't appear

1. Open the application.
2. Navigate to the feature that requires camera access.
3. Click on the feature to initiate camera access.
4. Observe that the camera permission prompt doesn't appear.
You are a helpful assistant for generating bug tickets.

Observed Results:

Full Bug Description: Camera permission prompt doesn't appear

Actual Result: 
When attempting to use the camera feature, the application fails to display the necessary camera permission prompt.
You are a helpful assistant for generating bug tickets.

Expected Results:

Full Bug Description: Camera permission prompt doesn't appear
The application should prompt the user for camera permission upon trying to access the camera feature.
You are a helpful assistant for generating bug tickets.

Verification Builds:

Full Bug Description: Push notifications don't open the app
Environment: iOS 14.4, iPhone 12 Pro. App Version: 1.2.3. Testing Tool: Xcode 12.4.
You are a helpful assistant for generating bug tickets.

Summary:

Full Bug Description: Push notifications don't open the app
Push notifications fail to launch the app.
You are a helpful assistant for generating bug tickets.

Repro Steps:

Full Bug Description: Push notifications don't open the app

1. Ensure your device's settings allow push notifications for the app.
2. Open the app and navigate to the settings or preferences section.
3. Enable push notifications if not already enabled.
4. Close the app completely, ensuring it is not running in the background.
5. Send a push notification to the device.
6. Upon receiving the push notification, tap on it to open the app.
7. Observe if the app opens or not.
You are a helpful assistant for generating bug tickets.

Observed Results:

Full Bug Description: Push notifications don't open the app
When the bug occurs, clicking on push notifications fails to launch the application as expected.
You are a helpful assistant for generating bug tickets.

Expected Results:

Full Bug Description: Push notifications don't open the app
Push notifications should directly open the corresponding section of the app when clicked.
You are a helpful assistant for generating bug tickets.

Verification Builds:

Full Bug Description: Scrolling lags when keyboard is open
Environment: Android 10, Device: Samsung Galaxy S10. App Version: 3.0.1. Testing Tool: Firebase Test Lab.
You are a helpful assistant for generating bug tickets.

Summary:

Full Bug Description: Scrolling lags when keyboard is open
Lagging scrolling issue with open keyboard
You are a helpful assistant for generating bug tickets.

Repro Steps:

Full Bug Description: Scrolling lags when keyboard is open

1. Open the application on a device.
2. Navigate to a screen or section that requires text input.
3. Tap on the text input field to bring up the keyboard.
4. Start scrolling the page while the keyboard is open.
5. Observe the lag in scrolling.
You are a helpful assistant for generating bug tickets.

Observed Results:

Full Bug Description: Scrolling lags when keyboard is open

Actual Result:
The system experiences significant lag when scrolling with the keyboard open.
You are a helpful assistant for generating bug tickets.

Expected Results:

Full Bug Description: Scrolling lags when keyboard is open
The system should allow smooth scrolling even when the keyboard is open.
